subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, April 26 — Kobe Bryant was serenaded with chants of “M.V.P.,” a sea of gold shirts bounced late into the evening Thursday at Staples Center, and the Los Angeles Lakers looked very much alive.
snippet: LOS ANGELES, April 26 — Kobe Bryant was serenaded with chants of “M.V.P.,” a sea of gold shirts bounced late into the evening Thursday at Staples Center, and the Los Angeles Lakers looked very much alive.
